title: Gotta go my own way
lyrics: tone      I gotta say what's on my mind. something about us doesn't seem right these days. life keeps getting in the way. whenever we try, some- how the plan is always rear- ranged it's so hard to say, but I've gotta do what's best for me. you'll be okay I've got to move on and be who I am I just don't be- long here I hope you under- stand we might find our place in this world some- day but at least for now, I gotta go my own way.  don't wanna leave it all be- hind, but I gave my hopes up and I watch them fall ev'ry time. another color turns to grey, and it's just to hard to watch it all slowly fade away. I'm leavin' to- day 'cause I've gotta do what's best for me. you'll be okay I've got to move on and be who I am I just don't be- long here I hope you under- stand we might find our place in this world some- day but at least for now, I gotta go my own way. what about us? what about ev'rything we've been through? what about trust? you know I never wanted to hurt you. and what about me? what am I supposed to do? I gotta leave but I'll miss you. uuuuuh so... I've got to move on and be who I am. I just don't belong here I hope you under- stand. we might find our place in this World some- day, but at least for now, I've got to move on and be who I am. I just don't belong here I hope you under- stand. we might find our place in this World some- day, but at least for now, I gotta go my own way.
